trans-unit.source: Defines the methods, properties, and events for server-side access to the HTML5 `input` element.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl"></xref> class based on the specified type.
The type of the control.
Processes the postback data for the HTML5 `input` element.
The index in the posted collection that references the content to load.
The collection of all posted values.
`true` if the posted content differs from the content in a previous postback; otherwise, `false`.
Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
The event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.ServerChange"></xref> event.
The event data.

Invokes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)"></xref> method when the posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl"></xref> element has changed.
Occurs when the content of the HTML5 `input` element changes between posts to the server.
When implemented in a derived class, processes postback data for an HTML5 `input` element.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
The index in the posted collection that references the content to load.
The collection of all posted values.
`true` if the state of the HTML5 `input` element changes because of the postback; otherwise, `false`.

When implemented in a derived class, invokes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)"></xref> method when the posted data for the HTML5 `input` element has changed.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
